definition: to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format

sentences.english: As Joey Tribbiani, Matt LeBlanc played the loveable male lunkhead of the group.
sentences.chinese: 马特饰演的乔伊是这个小团体中呆头呆脑的开心果。

sentences.english: Heckles?Wow, Heckles was voted class clown, and so was I.
sentences.chinese: 哇，Heckles被评为班里的开心果，我也是。

sentences.english: Pistachios are also a good source of protein.
sentences.chinese: 开心果也是蛋白质的一种好来源。

sentences.english: Do you think the squirrel will like the taste of pistachio?
sentences.chinese: 你沉得松鼠会喜欢开心果的味道吗？

sentences.english: Gale Harold: Well, I mean, there is a lot of clowning, I think.
sentences.chinese: 我想说，那里有很多开心果，我认为。

sentences.english: Now scientists claim to have found a possible solution in a type of pistachio nut.
sentences.chinese: 现在科学家声称在一种开心果中看到了希望。

sentences.english: An elegant glass jar full of salty and delicious California Pistachios , want it?
sentences.chinese: 雅致的罐子，装满了咸香的加州开心果。想要吗？

sentences.english: I was funny in that place. But I can't go back.
sentences.chinese: 我在那是个开心果，可是我不能回去。

sentences.english: Cats eat pistachios, appears to be rare.
sentences.chinese: 猫吃开心果，似乎很少见。

sentences.english: I will make you happy when you are depressed.
sentences.chinese: 在你抑郁的时候，我就是你的开心果。

sentences.english: I was really into trying to be a people-pleaser when I was younger.
sentences.chinese: 在我年轻的时候，我是真的想努力成为大家的开心果。

sentences.english: When youarennot hsoftwarey, I am your pistachios.
sentences.chinese: 当你烦闷乐的时候，我就是你的开心果。

sentences.english: The result suggested pistachio coffee might not take off in trendy coffee bars.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，开心果咖啡也许没有机会进入时尚咖啡屋。

sentences.english: He was always the class clown in school.
sentences.chinese: 在学校他总是班上的开心果。
开心果也是不错的选择。

definition: food preserved in sugar or honey
soft candy (gummi candy, gumdrop, jellybean etc)
melon seed/seeds of pumpkin, watermelon or sunflower etc, roasted and flavored, consumed as a snack
